originalText.text: Heritage members and volunteers are great group of people with plenty of diversity and its staff. These Pride events are very difficult to put together.. I got to say I find the website almost impossible for our small organization of AXIOS the Eastern Orthodox lgbtq+Christian org for us to sign up to register march. I tried calling and emailing sometime in may 2023. It's just hard to get somebody to call me back. This is a 40th anniversary including 40 years of marching. I've been recently attacked in a hate crime now I'm walking with a cain after my knee meniscus is totally destroyed and now I'm developing scoliosis because of the attack. I still want to march. Is anybody from heritage Park reading these reviews. I don't want to miss that in marching thos year. Happy pride everyone.

originalText.text:
I traveled from Fort Lauderdale, Florida to volunteer for this historic organization during Pride weekend in 2016. I cannot tell you how much I appreciated  the experience. The team was diverse and inclusive collection of individuals from every walk of life. They were never afraid to get their hands dirty and do the hard work no matter the position in the organization. I came with the purpose to learn and help and the were more than happy to teach me all they knew. They honestly made me feel like part of the family although none of them knew me personally.
I had such a wonderful experience that I am returning again in 2017 but this time with more people. I fondly remember this experience as one of the best in my life!

originalText.text: This summer 2018 I volunteered with NYC Pride and had a really great experience! The whole volunteer leadership team was very helpful and it was fun to meet so many new people and make some great new friends. Everyone I've come in contact with from  H.o.P was very professional and inclusive and they really helped make the whole experience a lot of fun.

originalText.text: Another capitalist establishment that only cares about their fellow white able bodied community. Not making pride accessible enough and kicking out poc members who give feedback. Yall are the problem.

text.text: Another capitalist establishment that only cares about their fellow white able bodied community. Not making pride accessible enough and kicking out poc members who give feedback. Yall are the problem.

originalText.text: We have contacted HOP several times about our media credentials for the June 30, 2019 parade. We never received an email with media credentials after personally texting with Jullian several, a person handling another department. I’m glad we didn’t set time aside. Very poorly managed. We miss dealing with Tish for media credentials, she was the one who ran things well there, never had an issue.
